name: Wild Dark Honey
description: My Village Forest (wild bee) honey is 100% Natural organic product sourced from Wayanad Deep Forest (Kerala). The Quality and taste of honey depend upon the flower visited by bees. This, in turn, depends on pasturage. As bees feed on the nectar produced by the flowers. Raw unprocessed honey may contain white foam on top. It is light flavorful and packed with air bubbles that have trapped some of the wondrous stuff that is in raw honey: pollen, propolis, wax and of course raw honey. My Village Wild honey from Waynad Forest is Unprocessed, Unheated, Raw honey just filtered using a cotton cloth.

name: Amla Honey (450g)
description: This herbal product is made by a perfect amalgamation of purest possible honey and natural gooseberry. This magical combination is a strong immune booster. Also prevents aging, Strengthens heart and digestive system, manages cholesterol level, acidity, gastritis, protects from infection and respiratory disorders.

name: Jaggery Coated Banana Chips (Sharkkara Varatti)
description: Sharkkara Varatti or Sharkkara upperi is a Kerala traditional snack, which is also called as sweet banana chips prepared  with raw banana, jaggery, Sunflower oil, Ginger and cardamom powder. My Village Sharkkara varatti is very tasty and healthy. We never add any kind of preservatives or chemical additives for taste or flavor.

name: Black Forest Honey
description: My Village Dark Honey, also known as Black Wild Honey, is a neat collection of large wild bees found in the forests of Nilambur (Kerala). This honey is made by bees, known as Apis cerana indica nesting under the ground in deep forest regions. This honey is very dark in colour and graded in the seventh category of dark colour.

name: Yellow handspun handwoven cotton fabric
description: A Fabric that became the symbol of India's Freedom Struggle, Nearly after seven decades of India's independence, Khadi has still navigated its place in the closet of every Indian household.

name: Kerala Banana Chips
description: My Village all Natural Healthy Snack made from organic banana fruits. Thin crunchy slices prepared from natural wood pressed coconut oil. This snack product is very healthy and tasty. No added preservatives or other chemical additives for taste, color or flavor.

name: Ripened Kerala Banana Chips
description: My Village all Natural Healthy Snack made from organic banana fruits. Thin crunchy slices are prepared from natural wood pressed coconut oil. This snack product is very healthy and tasty, contains No added preservatives or other chemical additives for taste, color or flavor. Natural Healthy Snack made from organic ripened banana fruits. Thin crunchy slices prepared from natural wood pressed coconut oil.

name: Village Cow Milk
description: We bring you fresh raw milk. Straight from our indigenous breed of cows to your house. Simply put, we take the milk, just as our healthy cows give us and put them into hygienic glass bottles, seal them and deliver them over to your door step. All this very minimal time, so that you can enjoy the goodness of our fresh and creamy milk. This is so unlike the usual homogenized and pasteurised milk that we consume today. And even unlike the raw milk that we get today from local sources.

name: Borma Cashew Nuts (unpeeled cashew with skin), 400gm
description: My Village Borma Cashew is unpeeled cashew with its skin on with a tinge of the delectable raw flavor. Closely monitored processing ensures that there are no sticky skins or over roasting. The process makes sure that only the flavor of borma cashew is experienced.

name: Barosi Cultured Cow Ghee, 1 L
description: Barosi A2 Desi Cow Ghee is made using fresh & pure Rathi and Sahiwal Cow milk procured from our farms using the Bilona method. The milk is converted into curd and the curd is slowly churned to make butter. The butter is then refined-carbohydrates, proteins, casein, lactose, impurities and water are removed, leaving only pure fat or oil.

name: Almond, 400g
description: My Village brings you the finest grade of California almonds direct from the source to your availability with a delicacy you can trust. Almonds are prized throughout the world for their delicious taste, crunchy texture, and, increasingly, for their nutritional value. California is the worldâ€™s largest producer of almonds.

name: Salted and Roasted Cashew Nuts (Dry Roasted / Zero cholesterol), 400g
description: Handpicked from the virgin forests and plantations across the continents of Africa and Asia, the raw nuts are processed by skilled labours with our updated technologies and are individually shelled to extract the cashew kernels. Our high standards ensure that all our cashews are carefully selected and treated with utmost attention at every stage of the production process untouched by hand.
